name: mercury-engine
description: The mercury engine generates web audio output from mercury code input

scripts.watch: watchify -t brfs src/mercury.js --standalone MercuryEngine -o dist/mercury.js -v | terser dist/mercury.js -o dist/mercury.min.js -c -m --comments 'false'
scripts.dist: mkdir dist && browserify -t brfs src/mercury.js | uglifyjs > dist/mercury.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run dist

author: Timo Hoogland
